name: flashlight2
description: It's a red plastic flashlight, you've had it for as long as you can remember. It still needs one more battery.

itemInteractions.Battery: You slip the second battery into the flashlight. With a flicker, your flashlight comes to life. You let out a small sigh of relief.

verbInteractions.Look at: It's a red plastic flashlight, you've had it for as long as you can remember. It still needs one more battery.
verbInteractions.Take/Pick up: You grab the flashlight and turn it on. It isn't working.
verbInteractions.Open: You unscrew the cap of the Flashlight. It's still missing one battery.
verbInteractions.Use: You flick the switch on and off, but nothing happens.
